text: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
author: A.A. Milne

text: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already.
author: Tommy Cooper

text: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not so sure.
author: Anonymous

text: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
author: Robin Williams

text: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Anonymous

text: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
author: Anonymous

text: Behind every great man, there’s a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

text: I can resist anything except temptation.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: My therapist says I have a preoccupation with vengeance. We'll see about that.
author: Anonymous

text: I’m not lazy. I’m just on energy-saving mode.
author: Anonymous

text: The early bird might get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
author: Anonymous

text: If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.
author: Steven Wright

text: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

text: I’m on a seafood diet. I see food, and I eat it.
author: Anonymous
